name: Albariño Mint Julep

ingredients.name: Albariño wine (Terras Gauda Abadia de San Campio 2009)
Crème de pêche (or high-quality peach liqueur)

preparation:
The crisp freshness of the Spanish white wine pairs perfectly with fresh mint.

Add both ingredients to a julep or large old fashioned glass.

Add lots of crushed ice and garnish lavishly with mint.
